burgers.name: Seitan Burger
burgers.notes: Made from seitan in the Cetus system, imported to Space Port by the Intergalactic Vegan Association.

burgers.name: Diner Burger
burgers.notes: We periodically send spies to Earth to bring this delicacy back to Space Port.

burgers.name: Halloumi Avocado Burger
burgers.notes: After the great halloumi depression of 2138 this is probably the rarest ingredient you'll find anywhere in the galaxy.

burgers.name: Grizzly Bear Burger
burgers.notes: The origin of this burgers name is unknown but it tastes great none the less. Just like fresh over the counter in Aldebaran.

burgers.name: Demolisher
burgers.notes: One all time favourite of Klingons and Vogons. Earthlings might find this to be ... demolishing.

burgers.name: Lava Burger
burgers.notes: If dragons were a spacefaring species, this would be their burger.

burgers.name: Bean burger
burgers.notes: After Bitcoin replaced beans as the intergalactic currency, these are finally affordable again for the common spacefarer.

burgers.name: Skyscraper
burgers.notes: Rumor has it that one of these was once structural support for an intergalactic peace treaty.
